en_title: LC: Speech by SJ in moving the third reading of Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2013
zh_title: 立法會︰律政司司長動議三讀《2013年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》致辭全文

en: Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2013 has passed through Committee stage with amendments. I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 《2013年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》經修正後已經通過全體委員會審議階段，我動議此《條例草案》予以三讀並通過。

en: Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2013 has passed through Committee stage with amendments
I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 《2013年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》經修正後已經通過全體委員會審議階段，我動議此《條例草案》予以三讀並通過
